original: @75b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @75b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: ma h'a badzra dha ra sto tra /
analyzed: ma h'a badzra dha ra sto tra /
translated: MahƒÅvajradharastotra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bstod pa /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bstod pa /
translated: Praise of Great Vajradhara

original: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthas klas pa na bzhugs pa'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / rdo rje lha mo dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo'i rgyal po la sogs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthas klas pa na bzhugs pa'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / rdo rje lha mo dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / khro bo'i rgyal po la sogs pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the perfect Buddhas dwelling in the ends of the ten directions, to the Vajra Goddesses, Bodhisattvas, Kings of Wrath, and so forth.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod par gyur to //
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po la bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis bstod par gyur to //
translated: Then the great Bodhisattva VajrapƒÅ·πái praised the Blessed One, Great Vajradhara, with this king of praises:

original: kun rdzob bden pa la phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: kun rdzob bden pa la phyag 'tshal //
translated: Homage to the conventional truth,

original: don dam khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: don dam khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to you, the ultimate,

original: bden gnyis dbyer med la phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: bden gnyis dbyer med la phyag 'tshal //
translated: Homage to the inseparability of the two truths,

original: rdo rje'i sku khyod la phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: rdo rje'i sku khyod la phyag 'tshal //
translated: Homage to you, the vajra body.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni dag / sku ni gdod nas nam mkha'i sku //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni dag / sku ni gdod nas nam mkha'i sku //
translated: Pure in body, speech, and mind, the body is primordially the sky's body,

original: rnam par mi rtog dmigs pa med //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog dmigs pa med //
translated: Non-conceptual, without reference.

original: rang bzhin med pa khyod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa khyod phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to you, who are devoid of intrinsic nature.üîΩYou have no virtuous or nonvirtuous thoughts,

original: dge dang mi dge'i rnam rtog dang // yid la byed dang sems pa med //
analyzed: dge dang mi dge'i rnam rtog dang // yid la byed dang sems pa med //
translated: No mental activity, and no intention.

original: rang bzhin gyis ni nam mkha'i tshul //
analyzed: rang bzhin gyis ni nam mkha'i tshul //
translated: You are by nature like space.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal //üîΩ'khor ba'i sgrub pas 'khor gyur pa'i //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal // 'khor ba'i sgrub pas 'khor gyur pa'i //
translated: I pay homage to you, Vajrasattva.üîΩThe five aggregates, which have become a wheelüîΩThrough the practice of sa·πÉsƒÅra, are completely pure,

original: phung po lnga ni rnam par dag / sangs rgyas lnga yi ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: phung po lnga ni rnam par dag / sangs rgyas lnga yi ngo bo nyid //
translated: The essence of the five buddhas.

original: nam mkhar gnas pa khyod phyag 'tshal //üîΩyongs su mi shes 'khor ba yi //
analyzed: nam mkhar gnas pa khyod phyag 'tshal // yongs su mi shes 'khor ba yi //
translated: I pay homage to you, who abide in space.üîΩFor the sake of embodied beings

original: rgya mtshor 'khyams pa'i lus can phyir //
analyzed: rgya mtshor 'khyams pa'i lus can phyir //
translated: Wandering in the ocean of sa·πÉsƒÅra, which is not fully understood,

original: yongs shes skya ba 'dzin pa yi //
analyzed: yongs shes skya ba 'dzin pa yi //
translated: You are the captain who fully understands.

original: ded dpon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //üîΩrtag dang mi rtag sogs rnams la //
analyzed: ded dpon khyod la phyag 'tshal lo // rtag dang mi rtag sogs rnams la //
translated: I pay homage to you.üîΩThose who are attached to permanence and impermanence

original: rtag dang mi rtag sogs rnams kyis //
analyzed: rtag dang mi rtag sogs rnams kyis //
translated: And so on, and those who are attached to permanence and impermanence

original: rnam dag lam ston la mkhas pa //
analyzed: rnam dag lam ston la mkhas pa //
translated: And so on, you are skilled in teaching the path of purity.

original: rdo rje slob dpon khyod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon khyod phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to you, vajra master.

original: rang gi sde dang gzhan gyi sde //
analyzed: rang gi sde dang gzhan gyi sde //
translated: Those of your own group and those of other groups

original: lta ba'i rims kyis btab pa yi //
analyzed: lta ba'i rims kyis btab pa yi //
translated: Are struck by the plague of views.

original: nad pa rnams ni gso mdzad pa //
analyzed: nad pa rnams ni gso mdzad pa //
translated: You heal the sick,

original: sman pa'i rgyal po khyod phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: sman pa'i rgyal po khyod phyag 'tshal //
translated: I pay homage to you, O King of Physicians.üîΩYour pure body is unstained

original: sna tshogs rnam par rtog pa yi //üîΩ'dam gyis ma gos gtsang ba'i sku //
analyzed: sna tshogs rnam par rtog pa yi // 'dam gyis ma gos gtsang ba'i sku //
translated: by the mud of various thoughts,

original: 'od gsal bar ni ngang gis gnas //
analyzed: 'od gsal bar ni ngang gis gnas //
translated: naturally abiding in luminosity,

original: pad+ma chen po khyod phyag 'tshal //üîΩzhes pa nam mkha' chen po'i rgyud las 'byung ba //
analyzed: pad+ma chen po khyod phyag 'tshal // zhes pa nam mkha' chen po'i rgyud las 'byung ba //
translated: I pay homage to you, O Great Lotus.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bstod pa /üîΩphyag na @76a * //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i bstod pa / phyag na @76a * //
translated: This praise of Great Vajradhara comes from the Tantra of Great Space.

original: rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
analyzed: rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so /
translated: The praise composed by Vajrapani is complete.

original: // / rje btsun gnas brtan chen po dpal rdo rje 'chang gi sku can spyan snga rin po che'i zhal snga nas kyi bka' bzhin zha lu lo ts'a ba dha rma p'a las dpal gdan sa thel gyi yang dgon du bsgyur ba'o//

translated: In accordance with the words of the venerable elder, the glorious Vajradhara in person, Chengawa Rinpoche, the translator from Zhalu, Dharmapala, translated this at the glorious Yang√∂n of Densatil.
